content.rendered:
New Apple iPhone 12 mini (64GB) – White
5.4-inch Super Retina XDR show
Ceramic Shield, harder than any smartphone glass
A14 Bionic chip, the quickest chip ever in a smartphone
Advanced twin-digital camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide and Wide cameras; Night mode, Deep (*12*), Smart HDR 3, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
12MP TrueDepth entrance digital camera with Night mode, 4K Dolby Vision HDR recording
Industry-leading IP68 water resistance
Supports MagSafe equipment for simple attachment and quicker wi-fi charging
iOS with redesigned widgets on the Home display, all-new App Library, App Clips and extra
